com.esri.svr.map
Class BaseMOJMapper

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.svr.map.BaseMOJMapper
Direct Known Subclasses:
EJBMapperI, EJBMapperII, ServletMapper
public abstract class BaseMOJMapper
extends Object

BaseMOJMapper provides base functionlity to process a HTTPServletRequest with map image generation left to the sub-classes.

                                    int selectedLayer,
                                    String extent,
                                    String queryString)
                             throws RemoteException
Select features based on the given query string and map extent for a selected layer in a given service

Parameters:
serviceName - the service name
selectedLayer - the selected layer index
extent - the query map extent
queryString - the query string
Returns:
a set of features
Throws:
RemoteException

select

protected abstract Feature[] select(String serviceName,
                                    int selectedLayer,
                                    String extent,
                                    String queryString,
                                    String findString,
                                    double bufferDistance,
                                    String bufferUnit,
                                    int targetLayer)
                             throws RemoteException
Select features based on the given query string or find string or buffer distance, and map extent for a selected layer in a given service. When buffer is applied, the return features will be those from target layer.

Parameters:
serviceName - the service name
selectedLayer - selected layer index
extent - the query map extent
queryString - the query string
findString - the find string
bufferDistance - the buffer distance
bufferUnit - the buffer unit
targetLayer - the target layer that the buffer will apply to
Returns:
a set of features
Throws:
RemoteException

getResponse

protected abstract MapResponse getResponse(String serviceName,
                                           int width,
                                           int height,
                                           String extent,
                                           boolean[] layerVisibility,
                                           int selectedLayer,
                                           String queryEnvelope,
                                           String queryString,
                                           String findString,
                                           double bufferDistance,
                                           String bufferUnit,
                                           int targetLayer)
                                    throws RemoteException
Get a response based on the given set of parameters. Only one of the three functions (query, find and buffer) will apply in a single call.

Parameters:
serviceName - the service name
width - map image width
height - map image height
extent - map extent
layerVisibility - layer visibility array
selectedLayer - the selected layer index
queryEnvelope - query envelope
queryString - query string
findString - find string
bufferDistance - buffer distance
bufferUnit - buffer unit
targetLayer - target layer to which the buffer will apply
Returns:
a MapResponse object
Throws:
RemoteException

getLayoutImage

public abstract String getLayoutImage(String serviceName,
                                      int width,
                                      int height,
                                      String extent,
                                      boolean[] layerVisibility,
                                      int selectedLayerIndex,
                                      String findString,
                                      String mapTitle)
get response from server with given set of parameters

Parameters:
serviceName - the service name
width - the image width
height - the image height
extent - the map extent
layerVisibility - the visibility list of each individual layers
selectedLayerIndex - the selected/active layer
findString - the find string
mapTitle - the map title string text

                                      int width,
                                      int height,
                                      String extent,
                                      boolean[] layerVisibility,
                                      int selectedLayerIndex,
                                      String queryEnvelope,
                                      String queryString,
                                      String mapTitle)
get response from server with given set of parameters

Parameters:
serviceName - the service name
width - the image width
height - the image height
extent - the map extent
layerVisibility - the visibility list of each individual layers
selectedLayerIndex - the selected/active layer
queryEnvelope - the spatial query filter
queryString - the query where clause
mapTitle - the map title text

getLayoutImage

public abstract String getLayoutImage(String serviceName,
                                      int width,
                                      int height,
                                      String extent,
                                      boolean[] layerVisibility,
                                      int selectedLayerIndex,
                                      String queryEnvelope,
                                      String queryString,
                                      double bufferDistance,
                                      String bufferUnit,
                                      int targetLayer,
                                      String mapTitle)
get response from server with given set of parameters

Parameters:
serviceName - the service name
width - the image width
height - the image height
extent - the map extent
layerVisibility - the visibility list of each individual layers
selectedLayerIndex - the selected/active layer
queryEnvelope - the spatial query filter
queryString - the query where clause
bufferDistance - buffer distance
bufferUnit - the buffer unit
targetLayer - the target layer for the buffer
mapTitle - layout title
Returns:
